name: Mind At Night
description:
Are they monsters?

Everything can become your enemy.... created by the imagination of yourself.

Objective:
  • Shoot carefully.
  • Collect equipment from loot boxes and "monster".
  • Find and defeat the horse-man hiding somewhere inside the "forest".
Control:

Move: WASD

Shoot: Left Mouse Click

Interact with items: E

Manual Reload: R
